WorkItem.ClosedComment: That's not how that works. The optimizer will use the gem in any active template in any way it can, not just in a specific color or order. The gemming templates that have all red vs one of each matching color, etc. are for the Charts. There's no reason to always go for the socket bonuses, you are only gimping yourself.
WorkItem.Description:
Description:
Optimizer is using unchecked gemming-templates
 
Steps to Reproduce:
I always want to use socket bonuses, so i dont want to use red gems in yellow or blue sockets. So i unchecked the gemming template with brilliant inferno ruby (red) in every socket. It works fine for the gear list on the right side, but when i run the optimizer it suggests brilliant inferno ruby in all of my yellow sockets.
 
Additional Information:
Rawr v4.1.03
 
Attachments:
Characterfile with deactivated gemming-template, just run optimizer to reproduce the problem
